0:
setup:
  debug: no
  loglvl: INFO

  guest_access: off
  admins:
    - service: gitlab_enterprise
      username: Saphir
    - service: gitlab_enterprise
      username: Alexsaphir

  timeseries:
    enabled: false

services:
  database_url: 'postgres://{{.Values.codecovConfig.database.login}}:{{.Values.codecovConfig.database.password}}@{{.Values.codecovConfig.database.host}}:{{.Values.codecovConfig.database.port}}/{{.Values.codecovConfig.database.db}}'

- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__LOAD_EXAMPLES
  value: 'False'
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__HIDE_SENSITIVE_VAR_CONN_FIELDS
  value: 'False'
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__DEFAULT_TIMEZONE
  value: Australia/Perth
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__BASE_URL
  value: 'https://airflow.${SECRET_DOMAIN}'
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__DEFAULT_WRAP
  value: 'True'
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__EXPOSE_CONFIG
  value: 'True'

- secretRef:
    name: airflow-secrets
- configMapRef:
    name: airflow-user-config
